title: Sudoku Showdown!
description: A competitive local multiplayer party game where players race to solve a Sudoku-inspired puzzle by picking up and placing numbers correctly.
additional: Implemented a backtracking algorithm for puzzle generation

title: Interweave
description: A VR horror game for Meta Quest set in a college campus where players collect clues, solve puzzles, and evade a lurking monster. Designed for an immersive and tense experience with interactive environments.
additional: Developed using Unity and C# for Meta Quest
Designed and modeled all 3D game elements
Used Substance Painter, Photoshop, and Blender for asset creation

title: Cup It!
description: A mobile game inspired by the classic party game beer pong. Players must aim, measure force and angle, and overcome obstacles to land the ball in the cup while using the fewest attempts and collecting all stars in each level.
additional: Designed and modeled all 3D game elements

title: Bare Minimum Pool Game
description: A simplified 8-ball pool game with core mechanics and a functional multiple-view system. Built for a straightforward and playable experience.
additional: Designed and modeled all 3D game elements

title: Mistake
description: A story-driven game about morality, where players recall past events during an investigation, gather clues, and uncover the truth.

title: Paper Towns
description: A 2D top-down survival game where players defeat enemies, gain experience, and level up stats. Developed as a challenge project without using built-in physics, colliders, or vector functions.

title: Pong (Dot Product)
description: A 2D game based on the classic Pong, developed as a challenge project without using built-in physics, colliders, or vector functions. Features both player vs. AI (with difficulty settings) and player vs. player modes.
additional: Developed all aspects except the sound system and sound effects

title: REVERTO
description: A 2D top-down roguelike survival game where players defeat enemies, gain experience, and level up stats. Features various enemy types and weapon options.

title: STARSHIP
description: A 2D top-down survival bullet-hell game set in space, where players battle different enemy types using various skills and characters. Includes an achievement system and save/load functionality.
